Quotation: Nobody ever figures out what life is all about, and it doesn't matter. Explore the world. Nearly everything is really interesting if you go into it deeply enough.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quotation: Study hard what interests you the most in the most undisciplined, irreverent and original manner possible.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quotation: You have no responsibility to live up to what other people think you ought to accomplish. I have no responsibility to be like they expect me to be. It's their mistake, not my failing.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quotation: Physics is like sex: sure, it may give some practical results, but that's not why we do it.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quotation: I'm smart enough to know that I'm dumb.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quotation: I would rather have questions that can't be answered than answers that can't be questioned.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quotation: The highest forms of understanding we can achieve are laughter and human compassion.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quotation: I think it's much more interesting to live not knowing than to have answers which might be wrong.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quotation: For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for nature cannot be fooled.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quotation: What I cannot create, I do not understand.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quotation: It doesn't matter how beautiful your theory is, it doesn't matter how smart you are. If it doesn't agree with experiment, it's wrong.
Author: Richard Feynman
